IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.select_vehicle') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.select_vehicle GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.select_vehicle @character_id dbo.id_t, @vehicle_id dbo.id_t AS SET NOCOUNT ON
UPDATE dbo.Characters SET select_vehicle_id = @vehicle_id WHERE id = @character_id
SET NOCOUNT OFF
